casebody.data:
Second Department,

May, 1949.

(May 2, 1949.) Benjamin W. Cohen et al., Suing on Their Own Behalf and on Behalf of All Other Stockholders of Fisk Rubber Corporation, Similarly Situated, Appellants, v. Charles A. Dana et al., Defendants, and Karl H. Behr et al., Respondents.

Present — Johnston, Acting P. J., Adel, Sneed, Wenzel and MacCrate, JJ. [See ante, p. 723.]
